message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product for $150. I believe it will be highly beneficial to you.
I appreciate the offer, but I'm on a tight budget. I'm willing to pay $100 for the product. Can you meet me at this price?
Thanks for the offer, Bob. I understand your budget constraints, but the product's value is quite a bit higher. How about we meet in the middle at $130?
I appreciate your willingness to meet in the middle, but I'm still a bit above my budget. Can you meet me at $110?
